name: Inform 6 Source Code File
summary: An I6 file contains Inform 6 (I6) source code that can be compiled into an Interactive Fiction (IF) program by Inform 7, an IDE used to create IF programs. It stores plain text with Unicode UTF-8 encoding in I6 syntax, and may also include Inform 7 (I7) source code. The code in the file outlines the rules and behaviors for how an IF program can be played as well as descriptions of playable game objects.
